io.spine.server.entity.storage

Class SimpleColumnType<T,R,C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.storage.SimpleColumnType<T,R,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the storage field
    R - the type of the record in the database, which holds a single cortege of data and is consumed by the database upon write
    C - the type of the column identifier in the R
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColumnType<T,T,R,C>

    @SPI
public abstract class SimpleColumnType<T,R,C>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ColumnType<T,T,R,C>
    A base for implementing ColumnType interface regardless the type conversion.

      T convertColumnValue(T fieldValue)
      Converts the EntityColumn specified in the Entity declaration to the type in which the Field is stored.

    • Method Detail

      • convertColumnValue

        public T convertColumnValue(T fieldValue)
        Description copied from interface: ColumnType
        Converts the EntityColumn specified in the Entity declaration to the type in which the Field is stored.

        Common example is converting com.google.protobuf.Timestamp into java.util.Date.

        Specified by:
        convertColumnValue in interface ColumnType<T,T,R,C>
        Parameters:
        fieldValue - the EntityColumn of the initial type
        Returns:
        the EntityColumn of the "store as" type
